body.name: FLEXISPOT OC3B Ergonomic Executive Mesh Office Task Chair Swivel Height Adjustable Seat Headrest Armrest Lumbar Support Caster Wheels For Computer Office Desk, Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 25 mins
features: Ergonomic Office Chair - Featuring reliable ergonomic support, the breathable mesh back and passive lumbar support release your body pressure both at home & office. It's easy to adjust seat height, headrest, backrest and arms to meet different needs, good for sitting long hours.

Reliable Comfort - High Density Mesh Cushion for all-day comfort and support.High quality mesh resists abrasion and transformation, and the mesh back and mesh seat keep air circulation for extra comfy.
Movable--Refresh your office space with this versatile choice for computer desks and workstations. Enjoy mobility over carpeted or hardwood floors with dual-wheel casters & chrome base.

Lock-in Tilt position-- Four-level tilt tension lockable line control mechanism give you more choice to tilt the chair when we want to rest yourself.The recline function makes you tilt the backrest back (90~120°) or sit straight freely.The office chair is larger than other chairs, and it could accommodate different body build. The whole Chair Dimensions(including the arms): 25.2"W x 21.3"D x 45.3"-52"H, the Seat Dimensions: 19.69"W x 21.26"D x 17.72"-21.65"H.Weight capacity is 220 lbs.
Adjustable Lifting Headrest--Adjustable Lifting Headrest With Hanger help you release your neck and take care of your clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ergonomic and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Been looking for the perfect chair for my flexispot desk. I didn't know they made chairs as well. The chair came in quick, easy to assemble alone, the caster wheels are smooth like butter. I love the adjustable headrest along with the arm rests. Easy to adjust up and down. The mesh is breathable and feels durable and premium. Can never go wrong with flexispot products. I'm a fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair is the best, buy it. I came from a Staples Hyken chair and chose the Ticova prior to this. It was made of metal and looked sturdy. It was horrible. Felt very uncomfortable and would squeak constantly. This is made of plastic and is very quiet, and very comfortable. The mesh is soft and conforms very well to the body. Recommended 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, but the design has changed and manufacturer has not updated the manual
reviews.reviewText: Chair is very comfortable and helps keep me from slouching.What I like:-Easy to assemble (with caveats below)-As stated, comfortable and ergonomic-Great value-Can lock at various inclined positionsWhat I dislike:-The undocumented design changes (see pics)Manual states to attach the mechanism to the seat back using 3 bolts through 3 holes. But the 3 holes are now slots and this is not entirely obvious at first. See attached pics. I show how the actual mechanism looks different from the manual, and how to align the slots.In addition, for the hanger, the manual says to remove 2 screws from the headrest. Those 2 screws are actually on the hanger, which also serves as the mount for the headrest. This also means you cannot mount the headrest without mounting the hanger. Based on other review I read here and elsewhere, this appears to be a recent change to address the difficulty in figuring out how to attach the hanger.Overall I am pleased but I feel like they could have taken the time to update the manual. I initially reached out to their support because I thought they shipped the wrong mechanism.Still, good chair. And a welcome upgrade from my old one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Students or WFM
reviews.reviewText: As a student, I spend a lot of time sitting at my desk. Prior to this chair, I was using a regular, basic chair, and I was surely paying the price for it. My neck and back would hurt pretty frequently from the long hours sitting in a poorly designed chair.I can definitely say, however, that after a month of using this chair, investing an ergonomic chair like this one makes all the difference! My neck and back muscles feel so much better supported with the adjustable rests on this chair; and the mesh, lightweight design makes it easy and comfortable to sit on this chair while I get work done for multi hour-long stretches as time. This is a must need for any student or any one that works from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, supportive, and stays cool
reviews.reviewText: PROS: 1) Easy to assemble, sturdy, ergonomic support. Some reviews have noted the distance between the lumbar support and the mesh back as being too great, but the mesh itself has offered me great support, so I've not really had to fiddle with this. 2) I bought this because the seat and back are both mesh, hoping it would be cooler with more airflow -- and it is; wooden seats and cushioned seats I've used have made me noticeably hotter as the day went on. This chair doesn't have that issue. Exactly why I bought it.CON: 1) Not much of a negative, but because the seat is mesh and can't sit up higher than the edges of the frame the mesh is attached to, the seat frame can sometimes feel a bit more present pressing against the outsides of your thighs. (A cushion extends above the seat frame sides and doesn't exhibit this.) It's not bad, but occasionally I notice it. Not enough to drop my rating to a 4 star.UPDATE: Several months later, the seat wobbles side to side in the base. Feels unsteady. Will update again if it becomes a bigger problem.UPDATE 2: 2.5 years later, the ring in the base where the piston sits has cracked, causing the seat to wobble significantly more from side to side, like to the point where you wonder if you'll fall over in the middle of using it. This is because the housing where the piston rests is plastic. The stated seat weight capacity was not exceeded. I'm throwing out this chair and purchasing a different chair that is of more sturdy construction, and with actual lumbar support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: I was sitting more than 8 hours for work and was feeling very stiff at the end of the day. I bought this chair and it is perfect, does not put pressure on the spine or joints. Fun to lean back and think. Lean back during conference calls.Some people have posted very helpful videos for setting up the head rest, you will need it. Recommend the chair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for. Better than I thought considering the price.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a chair with a mesh seat and back like the first generation Herman-Miller chair I tried at a job years ago. I really liked the mesh seat/back because I get hot easily. I went with this chair which was cheaper than another I found on Amazon. I liked the reviews better. I thought I got a more thorough idea of what I would get. So I went for the lower cost. In the reviews I read, people complained about the side of the seat digging into them because they were tall or they like to sit with one foot tucked under. I am 6' 5" and I sit with good posture. If you like sitting in a funny position, this chair is not for you (it's also not good posture btw).Others complained about the headrest and armrests. I figured I would just take them off. However, the armrests are actually a perfect height for my desk. Others complained about the headrest being too low. It is fine. It could be higher but I don't rest my head on it when I am working, only if I lean back and take a break. It is high enough. The warning I would give you is that mesh seats can get uncomfortable after a while if you cross your legs or slouch especially in shorts. But I have a memory foam cushion that was supposed to keep me cool (it did not). I can always put that on the seat when I want.The chair was very easy to assemble. It has been sturdy enough for me and I am not light. I did get an extra warranty because I was a little scared by the negative reviews. The warranty was cheap and it gave me peace of mind. This chair beats the heck out of the very expensive and very well built solid wood desk chair I was using.
Really happy with this chair. Sturdy and comfortable to sit in - I love a mesh chair. No issues putting it together and looks nice

Ehrlich gesagt ich hatte es früher nie verstanden wenn jemand einen Stuhl irgendwie besonders bequem fand; ein Stuhl war für mich einfach ein Stuhl. ABER mit diesem Kauf hat es sich schlagartig geändert.Ich habe noch nie in meinem Leben solch einen bequem Stuhl gehabt! Die Stütze am Kopf wirkte auf mich rein optisch irgendwie unbequem - aber ich sag euch - es so ist wahnsinnig gut! Man merkt einfach solch einen krassen Unterschied zu anderen Stühlen! Ich kann euch diese Stuhl sehr empfehlen, einfach Aufbau, super bequem, sieht stylisch aus, einfach perfekt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: The design of the chair fits the human body very well and the quality is great
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the chair is very good, sitting very comfortable, the back design is very close to the human body, i can adjust the height according to the height of body. Installation is also simple. The overall design is very good, the wheels slide very smoothly.
Pas mal avec un prix raisonnable, assez confortable mais je recommande quand meme d’avoir un essai avant d’effectuer l’achat pour voir si ça convient vraiment niveau postures.

-Entrega: Correcta, dentro de lo estimado.-La quería gris pero la tuve que pedir negra (no había stock de la gris según la web) y me llegó gris.-Embalaje: Un desastre, todo metido en la caja sin ningún tipo de orden.-Materiales: Se ven decentes aun siendo plástico en un 95%, lo único metálico es el sistema de reclinado y el amortiguador. Solo el tiempo dirá como se comportan con el desgaste.-La malla es correcta, no es la mejor pero parece resistente.-El reposacabezas es un desastre, se mueve muchísimo y el perchero no se puede quitar, si quieres reposacabezas vas a tener que montar el perchero sí os sí. Me parece una decisión terrible.-Las ruedas no son nada del otro mundo, ni las he montado, tenía unas de silicona tipo patines roller con freno y sin dudarlo son las que he montado.-Tema ergo: Bien, te obliga a poner la espalda de forma correcta aunque la sujeción lumbar no es nada del otro mundo.Por el precio no está mal, pero tiene muchas cosas a mejorar.
